recipe_name: Lemon curd, mascarpone and almond pancakes
method: Beat the icing sugar into the mascarpone a little at a time until smooth and sweet enough to suit your tastes. Spread the lemon curd over the pancakes. Top with a dollop of mascarpone and the flaked almonds.
